name: pbxproj_structure_check
summary: Simple ruby script to check if a Xcode *.pbxproj file objects structure matches a project physical directory structure
description: Simple ruby script to check if a Xcode *.pbxproj file objects structure matches a project physical directory structure. You need to enable pbxproj_structure_check.rb script manually as described on https://github.com/kam800/pbxproj_structure_check.git.
